title: Omega-3 Salmon with Miso Greens and Brown Rice

ingredients.item: fermented ingredient (miso, kimchi, yoghurt, or similar)

method: Cook gently to preserve omega-3 fats and polyphenols.
Add fermented ingredients at the end of cooking where possible.
Balance flavours with acid, herbs, and gentle spice.
swaps: Swap fish or meat for tofu or tempeh if preferred.
Use dairy-free yoghurt alternatives where needed.
notes: Designed to support the gut–brain axis through fibre diversity, omega-3 fats, polyphenols, fermented foods, and blood sugar stability. Uses olive, coconut, or avocado oil only.
